TowerDefense

Class StatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.GameObject
      • TowerDefense.StatusBar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StatusBarBadFeels, StatusBarHealth

    public class StatusBar
extends Engine.GameObject
    Status bars were used in the menu to display Towers' health and badFeels. They haven't been used in forever, and hence may be out of date.
    Author:
    Branden Drake, Rachel Horton

        public StatusBar(float xLoc,
                 float yLoc,
                 java.awt.Color fillColor,
                 java.awt.Color emptyColor)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        xLoc - X-coordinate of this object.
        yLoc - Y-coordinate of this object.
        fillColor - The color to fill the status bar with when it represents "full"
        emptyColor - The color to fill the status bar with when it represents "empty"
